v. 阅读 ；reader n .读者，读物
To read is to look at written or printed words and understand their meaning.
To read means to look at and comprehend the meaning of written or printed matter by interpreting the characters or symbols.
n. 阅读；读物,adj. 有学问的,vi. 读；读起来,vt. 阅读；读懂，理解
